original_title: The Kind of Commander He Is
overview: A story of life and service of the combat general and commander Viktor Kudlai, from himself and in the comments of his subordinates. In the film there are verses by Galich, Galkin and Karpenko performed by the three great Soviet and Russian actors.
tagline: A unique interview with a combat general, skillfully intertwined with three poems dedicated to soldiers and officers.
title: The Kind of Commander He Is
